trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether single or multiple item selections are supported by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definierar konstanter som anger om en eller flera objekt val som stöds av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>Egenskaper tillsammans bestämmer hur användarna kan välja objekt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is Single and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>, the user can select one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>är enkel och det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>är att <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>användaren kan välja en cell i taget i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: InExtended mode, select multiple items by holding down the SHIFT key to extend the selection from an anchor point or the CTRL key to individually select additional items.
trans-unit.target: InExtended läge, markera flera objekt genom att hålla ned SKIFT-tangenten för att utöka markeringen från en fästpunkt eller CTRL-tangenten till individuellt välja ytterligare objekt.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Flera objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> kan väljas i taget.

trans-unit.source: Only one item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Endast ett objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> kan väljas i taget.
